biotools.summary: Internationally leading information system on all aspects of enzymes, including function, structure, involvement in diseases, application, engineering, and molecular properties. The database includes hundreds of milllions of enzyme data and is compiled from manual literature annotation, data integration from other databases and predicted enzyme functions and locations.
